title: Hannah Brown reveals Tyler Cameron sent her a birthday text message following their failed romance
text:
Their on-screen romance may not have worked out in the real world, but Hannah Brown has remained friends with the man who nearly proposed to her, Tyler Cameron.

In fact, the handsome model even sent Hannah a birthday text following their failed romance.

'It was nice for him to text me on my birthday,' the pageant queen, 25, told Us Weekly after performing on Dancing With The Stars this last week.

'It was nice': Hannah Brown revealed her runner-up Tyler Cameron sent her a birthday text last month

Hannah celebrated her 25th birthday a month ago, and has been keeping busy since then as a fan favorite competitor on Dancing With The Stars.

For now, the reality star is simply grateful for the amount of support that has been coming her way following The Bachelorette.

'Just everyone that I've got to meet or come in contact with and just gain wisdom and advice from. It's really special,' she said.

Hannah really has come a long way this last year.

The way they were: The couple enjoyed many special moments together on The Bachelorette

Still friendly: Brown and Cameron have remained friendly after their wild season of The Bachelorette

After appearing on Colton Underwood's season of The Bachelor, Hannah landed her own season of The Bachelorette, where she ended up engaged to Jed Wyatt.

However the season ultimately ended with her single after she discovered Jed had a girlfriend back home in Nashville.

Hannah appeared on the verge of rekindling her relationship with runner-up Tyler when she asked him out for drinks afterwards.

Hand in hand: Hannah explored Amsterdam holding hands with Cameron on The Bachelorette

The pair were even spotted outside of Hannah's apartment after spending a night together.

To the disappointment of many Bachelor fans, the romance did not last.

Tyler ended up dating model Gigi Hadid shortly afterwards, and even accompanied her to her grandmother's funeral in the Netherlands.

The couple ended up calling it quits after a whirlwind two months together.
description: 'It was nice for him to text me on my birthday,' the pageant queen told Us Weekly after performing on Dancing With The Stars. Hannah celebrated her 25th birthday a month ago.
